mapper.insert: insert into users (userID, userPW, userName, userGender, userBirth, userPhone, userEmail) values (#{userID}, #{userPW}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: select userID, userPW from users where userID=#{userID} and userPW=#{userPW}
select userID from users where userID=#{userID}
